product_name: Channel Craft J. J.'s Canoe Knife Kit
long_description: Give the aspiring woodworker in your family the creative J. J.'s Canoe Knife Kit from Channel Craft. The precision laser-cut wooden pieces come in a tin box, and are ready to be assembled. The wooden pieces snap-fit together to form a canoe-shape pocketknife handle with 2 folding "blades". Provide your own glue, sandpaper, paints and wood stain and create an enhanced work of art. Pieces and instructions come in a reusable tin with a hinged lid. The Channel Craft J. J.'s Canoe Knife Kit is made in America.
short_description: Give the aspiring woodworker in your family the creative J. J.'s Canoe Knife Kit from Channel Craft. The precision laser-cut wooden pieces come in a tin box, and are ready to be assembled.
